title: In Elpitiya - Land for Limitless Income🌱🍃🏦
details:
“50 Acres Land”(total =60Acres) - GALLE District, Electricity’s and water supplied, 14 Acres of TEA, Rest of other land which is 36 Acres are cultivated of cinnamon, kithul, jack trees ,wallapatta, and more wealthy trees 🌳,Very good Income and Very good Environment, few days left for final deal, hurry up..

Please consider (Sale only Fifty Acres not One Acre) ( who wants to buy 15 or 20 Acres welcome!!) “This land is suitable for cultivation of any trees 🌳 ” Welcome for Tea factories,Investors and serious business man, No time wasters pls.You won’t get like this land for this price anywhere in Sri Lanka...( brokers welcome)
